website_summaries.verdict: For ease of use and comfort, you can't beat this ladder-style tree stand.
pros: Mesh seat is comfortable for long periods of sitting
Relatively lightweight for a ladder tree stand
cons: It's heavy, not really movable during a hunt
You would need to set it and leave it

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions correction
customer_reviews.text: Stand is quality made, holes line up well, I read a lot of feed back about seat bolts being too short and discovered why. If you read the wording for the forward foot piece it says use a 2" bolt but references a 23 which is a 2 1/2 , and again the upper seat bolts call for a 2 1/2 inch but references a 24 which is a 2" bolt. Reverse and assembly is smooth, I haven't used the stand yet so can't review that part yet.
customer_reviews.author: Billy J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Room
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time getting the seat on the stand due to txhe tight fit of the bolts and where the holes were located. I am very good at assembly but the seat took me at least 45 minutes. The rest of the stand was easy. Thus the 4 star rating. Very roomy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Poulton Charlie

customer_reviews.title: they are one of the best stands for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these already and besides the putting together part, they are one of the best stands for the money. Theyre comfortable to sit in for 4 hours or more and the shooting rail doesnt go up so far that you cant shoot a crossbow at 15-20 yards without really leaning over. I would always recommend this stand, unless you want something taller.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: It's just as described
customer_reviews.text: I can't attest to comfort as this was purchased for my husband for archery season. Assembly was easy, put it together before husband got home from work. Having to flip back and forth to bolt page to verify size was a drag but doable. Easy to put up to tree. Included straps could be longer as not all trees are uniform telephone diameter. Overall think this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TerriB541

customer_reviews.title: 2 man install,
customer_reviews.text: Hey it's a 1.5 man stand and I'm 5'11 , 300lbs it a good stand for money, had to add seat and back cusions, cause I sit for 6-7 hours at a time, added hoos to shooting rail to test gun, and have e taken a nap or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fayard

customer_reviews.title: Seat sewn on backwards
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this stand yet, will come back and update once we have. But pretty disappointed that when we got to the last step of attaching the seat, we realized the seat was sewn on backwards, so the design was facing the back instead of the front and looks really stupid. But after spending the hour or so putting it together, it's not worth sending back so we'll have to just deal with it. Too much money for something so lazy and careless to be pushed through.
customer_reviews.author: amanda dawson

customer_reviews.title: 64 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Nothing against this product, I just didn't do enough research. 64 pounds (according to UPS) is not what I want to haul into the woods as deeply as I wanted a tree stand. What I want is either a hang on, or climbing stand, not a ladder stand.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Barwell

customer_reviews.title: seat is difficult to mount
customer_reviews.text: stand is excellent. directions could be better. seat is difficult to attach, but made it work by using my own (longer) bolts. it was easy to set up and is quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: s.j.v.

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder for price - sturdy but add extra ratchet strap to platform - to be safe.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this tree stand compared to others purchased in past. The anodized metal coating is a plus to prevent rust. Ladder was sturdier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Connie McGuirk

customer_reviews.title: Shooting rail is fixed. Makes entry harder.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Well made. Shooting rail is fixed and I don’t like that. Would be easier to get in to if the rail pivoted up. Most stands do.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stand but can be challenging to put the seat on during assembly.
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok stand. I didnt have enough of the longer bolts to assemble properly. The seat is too difficult to put together also.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Bush

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for husband he likes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas for my husband and he says so far, he likes it! His only complaint is that he says the seat is not really long enough and it feels like you may slip out of the front of the seat, but other than that he says he likes it for the most part!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable! I'm a totally disabled vet with serious back problems and I was able to sit sun up to sundown 4 straight days til I got my buck. Really well constructed as well. I would recommend this stand to anybody serious about deer hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Good tree stand
customer_reviews.text: Nice stand...comfortable! take your time read the instructions... Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, well built.
customer_reviews.text: The ladder stand arrived as stated. Easy to put together & appears well built. I'll put it in the woods as soon as it stops raining.
customer_reviews.author: thomas d willett

customer_reviews.title: Good stand
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable stand. Came with two of the same legs so assembly was a little more difficult than it should be.
customer_reviews.author: TeresaJackson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my dad! He absolutely loves it! He's ordered 2 more already lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: Rivers edge ladder stands are the best. Very comfortable and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stand and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It comfortable, the assembly was not bad, just finger tighten all the screws during assembly. Once everything is assembled, the tighten all the bolts, it was easier this way. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible.
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't very comfortable but I would probably recommend for kid/teens. It was easy to assemble and have had no problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy stand and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy stand. Not the easiest to get together, but sturdy now that it’s together and up.
customer_reviews.author: KKisme

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I would buy again. I’m 6’1” 225 plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well built stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand was easy to put together and the metal is a heavy weight that I was looking for in a stand.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: AMPLE room for me and quiet - easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is the MAC daddy for relaxing in the stand. I am 280 lbs and under 6' tall. AMPLE room for me and quiet - easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: GoAngus

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I recommend to anyone who needs a much more comfortable stand to sit longer during the day.with my bad back I can not sit long of the stand does not support me.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE ASHMEAD

customer_reviews.title: Good stand
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and quiet stand. Easy to set up . Can’t go wrong with this stand
customer_reviews.author: travis Phillips

customer_reviews.title: HATE THE SEAT
customer_reviews.text: You better make sure your stand is completely on flat ground and not sloping forward at all, otherwise you might slide right out of the seat. I don't like the fact the seat is not divided between the back rest and the bottom. Very sturdy, nice stand, but the seat is not good at all. No give whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rivers Edge RE631 Relax Wide Ladder Stand,Black
product_meta.description: EXTRA-WIDE LOUNGER-STYLE SEATING - The Relax Wide is lightweight and efficient. Its lounger seat offers an ergonomic design that brings all-day comfort for those extra-long hunts. Plus the extra-wide design means you have even more room. Sit back and relax on your next hunting adventure from the comforts of the Relax Wide treestand.
feature_bullets: Comfortable, ergonomic TearTuff mesh seat and backrest for all day hunting
Crossbeams under seat provide added stability
